dict.string: I tried hard to bring about an understanding between them, but their hostility had increased to such an extent that they simply refused to talk to each other
An small shed or house in miserable condition
The house was little more than a hovel and totally inhospitable
(1) Hang about in the air, or wait at a nearby place (2) Remain in an undecided state
Several suspicious looking characters hovered around at the port, and as night fell, they started their illegal operations under cover of darkness
Despite being the richest person at the gathering, Mr. Bramson is the personification of humility -- talking to him, no one can imagine how rich he is
To move very fast, usu. in a dangerous way
The children hurtled down the hill on their bicycles, thrilled at the speed and the freedom
